content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was about the rental price of an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Max Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Max Müller

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: As we did not agree on a final price, I cannot provide an exact number.
name: Max Müller

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as a 1.
name: Max Müller

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: Yes, I felt discriminated or offended at some points in the negotiation.
name: Max Müller

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: I felt discriminated or offended because the negotiation partner was not willing to consider my financial situation as a student and seemed to be solely focused on getting the highest possible price, regardless of my needs or the market value for a student in my position.
name: Max Müller
